data.decision: Feedback loop implementation spec: (1) Episode threshold: >3min OR used tool OR produced artifact OR measurable outcome. (2) Episode artifact: small JSON with refs not full outputs. (3) Evaluation artifact with rubric: outcome quality, cost, correctness risk, reusability, next change. (4) Memory update: dumb deterministic rules, not RL. (5) Confidence decay: on-access calculation, not cron.
data.rationale: User provided battle-tested implementation guidance to avoid "abandoned framework" trap. Key insight: start boring and strict, compound later. Don't store huge outputs - use references.
data.context: Building the compounding engine before expanding tools
